# from pyspark.sql.functions import *
# from pyspark.sql.window import Window
# from pyspark.sql.types import IntegralType

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
publictrack_tmp
AS
SELECT 
       id
      ,tripid as tms_track_tripid
      ,tracktype as tms_track_tracktype
      ,to_timestamp(trackdate) as tms_track_trackdate
FROM publictrack
WHERE tracktype = 'Complete'

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stbooking_tmp
AS
SELECT 
     tms_booking_tripid
    ,sum(tms_booking_directbooking) as tms_booking_directbooking
FROM stbooking
GROUP BY tms_booking_tripid

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
sttrip_tms
AS
SELECT 
    lt.id as tms_trip_id
    ,lt.driverid as tms_trip_driverid
    ,UPPER(pb.firstname||'_'||pb.lastname) tms_trip_drivername
    ,lt.vehicleid as tms_trip_vehicleid
    ,vbv.fleetcode as tms_trip_vehiclefleetcode
    ,lt.trailerid as tms_trip_trailerid
    ,vbt1.fleetcode as tms_trip_trailer1fleetcode
    ,vbt1.vehicletrailersize as tms_trip_trailer1size
    ,lt.sectrailerid as tms_trip_sectrailerid
    ,vbt2.fleetcode as tms_trip_trailer2fleetcode
    ,vbt2.vehicletrailersize as tms_trip_trailer2size
    ,CAST(COALESCE(CAST(TRIM(LEFT(vbt1.vehicletrailersize,2)) AS int),0)+COALESCE(CAST(TRIM(LEFT(vbt2.vehicletrailersize,2)) AS int),0) AS STRING)||' '||'METER' as tms_trip_trailersize
    ,lt.status as tms_trip_status
    ,lt.routeid as tms_trip_routeid
    ,lt.opsrouteid as tms_trip_opsrouteid
    ,lt.startfromaddress as tms_trip_startfromaddress
    ,lt.startfromlat as tms_trip_startfromlat
    ,lt.startfromlng as tms_trip_startfromlng
    ,to_timestamp(lt.dispatchdate) as tms_trip_dispatchdate
    ,lt.stopaddress as tms_trip_stopaddress
    ,lt.stoplat as tms_trip_stoplat
    ,lt.stoplng as tms_trip_stoplng
    ,to_timestamp(lt.insdate) as tms_trip_insdate
    ,to_timestamp(lt.moddate) as tms_trip_moddate
    ,lt.insby as tms_trip_insby
    ,lt.onrouteid as tms_trip_onrouteid
    ,lt.uuid as tms_trip_uuid
    ,lt.insbyuser as tms_trip_insbyuser
    ,lt.thirdpartyid as tms_trip_thirdpartyid
    ,lt.timehash as tms_trip_timehash
    ,lt.onroutestatus as tms_trip_onroutestatus
    ,to_timestamp(lt.lastupdate) as tms_trip_lastupdate
    ,lt.lastlng as tms_trip_lastlng
    ,lt.lastlat as tms_trip_lastlat
    ,lt.controllerid as tms_trip_controllerid
    ,lt.trackstatus as tms_trip_trackstatus
    ,lt.lastrackid as tms_trip_lastrackid
    ,lt.customer as tms_trip_customer
    ,lt.bookings as tms_trip_bookings
    ,lt.controller as tms_trip_controller
    ,lt.transporter as tms_trip_transporter
    ,lt.legacyid as tms_trip_legacyid
    ,lt.originatedfrom as tms_trip_originatedfrom
    ,lt.local as tms_trip_local
    ,to_timestamp(lt.startdate) as tms_trip_startdate
    ,to_timestamp(lt.enddate) as tms_trip_enddate
    ,to_timestamp(lt.actualdeliverydate) as tms_trip_actualdeliverydate
    ,lt.note as tms_trip_note
    ,to_timestamp(lt.deliverydate) as tms_trip_deliverydate
    ,lt.internalexternal as tms_trip_internalexternal
    ,lt.pickupstartaddress as tms_trip_pickupstartaddress
    ,to_timestamp(lt.originaletadate) as tms_trip_originaletadate
    ,to_timestamp(lt.currentetadate) as tms_trip_currentetadate
    ,to_timestamp(lt.lastetaupdate) as tms_trip_lastetaupdate
    ,'v2' as tms_trip_source

FROM publictrip lt
LEFT JOIN dbovehiclebasic vbv on vbv.uid = lt.vehicleid
LEFT JOIN dbovehiclebasic vbt1 on vbt1.uid = lt.trailerid
LEFT JOIN dbovehiclebasic vbt2 on vbt2.uid = lt.sectrailerid
LEFT JOIN dbopeoplebasic pb on pb.uid = lt.driverid

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stthirdparty_tmp
AS
SELECT DISTINCT
    bpt.tripid
    ,CASE 
        WHEN lb.id = 65190 THEN 'TANZER TRANSPORT' 
        WHEN lb.id = 70593 THEN 'TAURAS TRANS CC' 
        WHEN lb.id = 72599 THEN 'TRANSSA TRASNPORTERS' 
        ELSE lp.name
    END as name
FROM dbolhbooking lb 
LEFT JOIN  dbolhbookingspertrip bpt on bpt.BookingID = lb.ID 
LEFT JOIN  dbolh_3pl lp on lp.id = lb.3PL_ID 
WHERE bpt.tripid>0
AND lb.allocationdate > '2020-08-31 23:59:59.999'
AND lb.bookingtypeid in (1,3)

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
sttrip_lms_tmp0
AS
SELECT DISTINCT 
t.id
,t.trailerid
,v.fleetno
,CASE 	
	WHEN lts.Description = '4 Meter' THEN 1
	WHEN lts.Description = '6 Meter' THEN 2
	WHEN lts.Description = '12 Meter' THEN 3
	WHEN lts.Description = '15 Meter' THEN 4
	WHEN lts.Description = '18 Meter' THEN 5
	
END as Trailersize
,CAST(LEFT(lts.Description,2) AS int) as sumsize
,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
          PARTITION BY CAST(LEFT(lts.Description,2) AS int) 
          ORDER BY CAST(LEFT(lts.Description,2) AS int) DESC) rownum

from dboLHTrip t 
LEFT JOIN dbovehicle v on v.id = t.TrailerID
LEFT JOIN dbolhbookingspertrip lbpt on lbpt.TripID = t.ID 
LEFT JOIN dbolhbooking lb on lb.id = lbpt.BookingID 
LEFT JOIN dbolhtrailersize lts on lts.id =  lb.TrailerSizeID  

WHERE lb.allocationdate > '2020-08-31 23:59:59.999'
AND lb.bookingtypeid in (1,3)
AND lbpt.tripid>0

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
sttrip_lms_tmp1
AS
SELECT DISTINCT 
*
FROM sttrip_lms_tmp0
WHERE rownum = 1

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
sttrip_lms_tmp2
AS
SELECT
DISTINCT
t.id
,t.TrailerID
,t.FleetNo
,MAX(Trailersize) Trailersize
,CASE 
	WHEN MAX(Trailersize) = 5 and sum(sumsize) > 18 THEN 18
	WHEN MAX(Trailersize) = 4 and sum(sumsize) > 18 THEN 15
	ELSE SUM(sumsize)
END as sumsize
FROM sttrip_lms_tmp1 t
GROUP BY
t.id
,t.TrailerID
,t.FleetNo

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
sttrip_lms_tmp3
AS
SELECT DISTINCT 
lt.id
,CASE 
	WHEN lbpt.tripid in (2188,5563,7070,7167,7557,8361,8543,8647,9231,10050,10161,11478,11495,13024,16738,16977,17105,17112,17436,17930,21970,39539,44340,44572,61574,62471) THEN 3
	ELSE lb.BookingTypeID 
END as BookingTypeID


FROM dbolhbookingspertrip lbpt 
LEFT JOIN dboLHTrip lt on lt.ID  = lbpt.tripid 
LEFT JOIN dbolhbooking lb on lb.id = lbpt.bookingid
WHERE lb.BookingTypeID in (1,3)
AND lt.id IS NOT NULL
AND lb.allocationdate > '2020-08-31 23:59:59.999'
AND lb.bookingtypeid in (1,3)
AND lbpt.tripid >0

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
sttrip_lms_tmp4
AS
SELECT 
a.id
,trailerid
,fleetno
,trailersize
,sumsize
,bookingtypeid
FROM  sttrip_lms_tmp2 a
LEFT JOIN  sttrip_lms_tmp3 b on b.id = a.id
ORDER BY sumsize desc

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
sttrip_lms
AS
SELECT 
    (lt.id)*-1 as tms_trip_id
    ,(x.driverid)*-1 as tms_trip_driverid
    ,UPPER((d.fname||'_'||d.surname)) tms_trip_drivername
    ,(x.vehicleid)*-1 as tms_trip_vehicleid
    ,v.fleetno as tms_trip_vehiclefleetcode
    ,(lt.trailerid)*-1 as tms_trip_trailerid
    ,t1.fleetno as tms_trip_trailer1fleetcode
    ,null as tms_trip_trailer1size
    ,(x.trailer2id)*-1 as tms_trip_sectrailerid
    ,t2.fleetno as tms_trip_trailer2fleetcode
    ,null as tms_trip_trailer2size
    ,CAST(lt.sumsize AS STRING)||' '||'METER' AS tms_trip_trailersize
    ,ts.description as tms_trip_status
    ,null as tms_trip_routeid
    ,(x.routeid)*-1 as tms_trip_opsrouteid
    ,x.dispatchaddress as tms_trip_startfromaddress
    ,x.dispatchlongitude as tms_trip_startfromlat
    ,x.dispatchlatitude as tms_trip_startfromlng
    ,to_timestamp(coalesce(x.dispatchdate,x.cdate)) as tms_trip_dispatchdate
    ,x.destinationaddress as tms_trip_stopaddress
    ,x.destinationlongitude as tms_trip_stoplat
    ,x.destinationlatitude as tms_trip_stoplng
    ,null as tms_trip_insdate
    ,null as tms_trip_moddate
    ,null as tms_trip_insby
    ,null as tms_trip_onrouteid
    ,(x.userid)*-1 as tms_trip_uuid
    ,null as tms_trip_insbyuser
    ,null as tms_trip_thirdpartyid
    ,null as tms_trip_timehash
    ,null as tms_trip_onroutestatus
    ,null as tms_trip_lastupdate
    ,null as tms_trip_lastlng
    ,null as tms_trip_lastlat
    ,null as tms_trip_controllerid
    ,null as tms_trip_trackstatus
    ,null as tms_trip_lastrackid
    ,null as tms_trip_customer
    ,null as tms_trip_bookings
    ,null as tms_trip_controller
    ,CASE 
        WHEN lt.id in(68453,66450,61094) THEN 'CITY LINEHAUL'
        ELSE coalesce(tp.name,'CITY LINEHAUL') 
    END as tms_trip_transporter
    ,null as tms_trip_legacyid
    ,null as tms_trip_originatedfrom
    ,null as tms_trip_local
    ,null as tms_trip_startdate
    ,null as tms_trip_enddate
    ,null as tms_trip_actualdeliverydate
    ,null as tms_trip_note
    ,null as tms_trip_deliverydate
    ,null as tms_trip_internalexternal
    ,null as tms_trip_originaletadate
    ,null as tms_trip_currentetadate
    ,null as tms_trip_lastetaupdate
    ,null as tms_trip_pickupstartaddress   
    ,'v1' as tms_trip_source
FROM sttrip_lms_tmp4 lt
LEFT JOIN dboLHTrip x on x.id = lt.id
LEFT JOIN dboLHTrackStatus ts on ts.id = x.tripstatusid
LEFT JOIN stthirdparty_tmp tp on tp.tripid = lt.id
-- LEFT JOIN dbolhbookingspertrip bpt on bpt.tripid = lt.id
-- LEFT JOIN dbolhbooking lb on lb.id = bpt.bookingid
LEFT JOIN dbovehicle v on v.id = x.vehicleid
LEFT JOIN dbovehicle t1 on t1.id = x.trailerid
LEFT JOIN dbovehicle t2 on t1.id = x.trailer2id
LEFT JOIN dbodriver d on d.id = x.driverid

-- WHERE lb.allocationdate > '2020-08-31 23:59:59.999'
-- AND lb.bookingtypeid in (1,3)

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
sttrip_tmp2
AS
SELECT 
    st.*
    ,d.id as orv_dispatch_id
    ,d.lmsid as orv_dispatch_lmsid
    ,d.vid as orv_dispatch_vid
    ,d.did as orv_dispatch_did
    ,d.status as orv_dispatch_status
    ,to_timestamp(d.startdate) as orv_dispatch_startdate
    ,to_timestamp(d.stopdate) as orv_dispatch_stopdate
    ,d.vehicletype as orv_dispatch_vehicletype
    ,d.uid as orv_dispatch_uid
    ,to_timestamp(d.estdepdate) as orv_dispatch_estdepdate
    ,d.trailer as orv_dispatch_trailer
    ,d.trailer2 as orv_dispatch_trailer2
    ,d.fromlocid as orv_dispatch_fromlocid
    ,d.tolocid as orv_dispatch_tolocid
    ,d.site as orv_dispatch_site
    ,to_timestamp(d.lastupdate) as orv_dispatch_lastupdate
    ,d.etastatus as orv_dispatch_etastatus
    ,d.startinglat as orv_dispatch_startinglat
    ,d.startinglng as orv_dispatch_startinglng
    ,d.endinglat as orv_dispatch_endinglat
    ,d.endinglng as orv_dispatch_endinglng
    ,d.startingfrom as orv_dispatch_startingfrom
    ,d.goingto as orv_dispatch_goingto
    ,d.importissue as orv_dispatch_importissue
    ,to_timestamp(d.insdate) as orv_dispatch_insdate
    ,to_timestamp(d.estarrdate) as orv_dispatch_estarrdate
    ,d.duration as orv_dispatch_duration
    ,d.distance as orv_dispatch_distance
    ,d.cost as orv_dispatch_cost
    ,d.stoplat as orv_dispatch_stoplat
    ,d.stoplng as orv_dispatch_stoplng
    ,d.stopreason as orv_dispatch_stopreason
    ,d.startodo as orv_dispatch_startodo
    ,d.stopodo as orv_dispatch_stopodo
    ,d.expduration as orv_dispatch_expduration
    ,d.expdistance as orv_dispatch_expdistance
    ,d.expcost as orv_dispatch_expcost
    ,d.collectionid as orv_dispatch_collectionid
    ,d.crew as orv_dispatch_crew
    ,d.crewnames as orv_dispatch_crewnames
    ,d.bocloseuid as orv_dispatch_bocloseuid
    ,d.routing as orv_dispatch_routing
    ,d.swapct as orv_dispatch_swapct
    ,d.debriefed as orv_dispatch_debriefed
    ,d.debriefnotes as orv_dispatch_debriefnotes
    ,d.bopin as orv_dispatch_bopin
    ,d.cpicost as orv_dispatch_cpicost
    ,d.labourcost as orv_dispatch_labourcost
    ,d.maintcost as orv_dispatch_maintcost
    ,d.inscost as orv_dispatch_inscost
    ,d.tollcost as orv_dispatch_tollcost
    ,d.fuelcost as orv_dispatch_fuelcost
    ,d.internal as orv_dispatch_internal
    ,d.childids as orv_dispatch_childids
    ,d.guid as orv_dispatch_guid
    ,d.timedefinite as orv_dispatch_timedefinite
    ,d.orvcode as orv_dispatch_orvcode
    ,to_timestamp(d.tsstopdepoenter) as orv_dispatch_tsstopdepoenter
    ,to_timestamp(d.tsstartdepoexit) as orv_dispatch_tsstartdepoexit
    ,d.reroutect as orv_dispatch_reroutect
    ,to_timestamp(d.actualarrdate) as orv_dispatch_actualarrdate
    ,d.physicalstartlat as orv_dispatch_physicalstartlat
    ,d.physicalstartlng as orv_dispatch_physicalstartlng
    ,to_timestamp(d.tsstartdepoexitapp) as orv_dispatch_tsstartdepoexitapp
    ,to_timestamp(d.tsstopdepoenterapp) as orv_dispatch_tsstopdepoenterapp
    ,to_timestamp(d.uncanceldate) as orv_dispatch_uncanceldate
    ,d.uncancelusername as orv_dispatch_uncancelusername
    ,d.lmsdebrifed as orv_dispatch_lmsdebrifed
    ,d.reviseddebrief as orv_dispatch_reviseddebrief
    ,d.lhtransporter as orv_dispatch_lhtransporter
    ,d.triptype as orv_dispatch_triptype
    ,d.startreason as orv_dispatch_startreason
    ,d.route as orv_dispatch_route
    ,d.tmstraileridentify as orv_dispatch_tmstraileridentify
    ,d.tmstrailer2identify as orv_dispatch_tmstrailer2identify
    ,d.tmscontroller as orv_dispatch_tmscontroller
    ,d.routekey as orv_dispatch_routekey
    ,d.courierid as orv_dispatch_courierid
    ,to_timestamp(d.originalstartdate) as orv_dispatch_originalstartdate
    ,to_timestamp(d.originalextarrival) as orv_dispatch_originalextarrival
    ,d.recomputeoriginals as orv_dispatch_recomputeoriginals
    ,d.originalextdistance as orv_dispatch_originalextdistance
    ,d.originalextduration as orv_dispatch_originalextduration
    ,to_timestamp(d.moddate) as orv_dispatch_moddate
    ,d.tmsmode as orv_dispatch_tmsmode
    ,d.driversignature as orv_dispatch_driversignature
    
    --trip.deliverydate set on booking allocation using the delivery date on the booking being the last booking allocated it does not update if this changes on the booking y the controller ie its the original deliverydate
    --trip.startdate set when tracking is started
    --trip.enddate set when tracking is completed
    --tms_track_completetrackdate is the track time complete is logged on tms tracking


    --tms_trip_appduration only available when ORV is used
    ,(coalesce(coalesce(d.tsstopdepoenterapp,d.tsstopdepoenter),to_unix_timestamp(st.tms_trip_enddate)) - to_unix_timestamp(st.tms_trip_originaletadate)) as tms_trip_appduration
   
    --tms_trip_driverduration only available when ORV is used
    ,(d.stopdate - d.startdate) as tms_trip_driverduration
   
    ,(to_unix_timestamp(st.tms_trip_enddate) - to_unix_timestamp(st.tms_trip_startdate)) as tms_trip_controlroomduration
    ,CASE 
        WHEN coalesce(coalesce(coalesce(coalesce(d.tsstopdepoenterapp,d.tsstopdepoenter),d.stopdate),to_unix_timestamp(t.tms_track_trackdate)),to_unix_timestamp(st.tms_trip_enddate)) is null THEN 'unknown'
        WHEN coalesce(coalesce(coalesce(coalesce(d.tsstopdepoenterapp,d.tsstopdepoenter),d.stopdate),to_unix_timestamp(t.tms_track_trackdate)),to_unix_timestamp(st.tms_trip_enddate)) < to_unix_timestamp(st.tms_trip_deliverydate) THEN 'ontime'
        ELSE 'late'
    END tms_trip_arrivedontime
    ,CASE 
        WHEN b.tms_booking_directbooking>0 then 1
        ELSE 0 
     END tms_trip_directtrip
     ,t.tms_track_trackdate as tms_track_completetrackdate
   
FROM sttrip_tmp st
LEFT JOIN publicDispatch d on d.lmsid = st.tms_trip_id and d.vehicletype = 2 and tmsmode = 2
LEFT JOIN stbooking_tmp b on b.tms_booking_tripid = st.tms_trip_id
LEFT JOIN publictrack_tmp t on t.tms_track_tripid = st.tms_trip_id and t.rn=1

sttrip = sttrip_tmp2.withColumn("a", pow(sin(radians (col("orv_dispatch_physicalstartlat") - col("tms_trip_startfromlat")) / 2), 2) + cos(radians ("tms_trip_startfromlat")) * cos(radians (col("orv_dispatch_physicalstartlat"))) * pow(sin(radians (col("orv_dispatch_physicalstartlng") - col("tms_trip_startfromlng")) / 2), 2)).withColumn("orv_dispatch_actualstartfromexpected", atan2(sqrt(col("a")), sqrt(-col("a") + 1)) * 2 * 6371)
